content.title: Front-end Developer
content.description: Hi, I have been working with web development for about 10 years, I'm graduated in Information Systems and also in Technical Programming. I participate in open source projects on Github and I'm a great Javascript enthusiast, At the moment I'm working at YoungCapital, the greatest Job suppliers in Netherlands. Would you like to know more about me? Check it out my {link1} and {link2}.
